snippet: The Baltimore Ravens and quarterback Joe Flacco agreed on a three-year contract extension that could keep him with the team through the 2021 season.
abstract: Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco agrees to three-year contract extension; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore Ravens and quarterback Joe Flacco agreed on a three-year contract extension that could keep him with the team through the 2021 season.

headline.main: Joe Flacco Receives Extension From Ravens
